maintext:
New officers were elected at the South Carolina Baptist Coventionâ€™s Executive Board meeting on Thursday, Dec. 7.
Tommy Kelly, pastor of First Baptist Church, Varnville, and former SCBC president, was elected chairman of the Executive Board. Randy Kirby, worship pastor at First Baptist Church, Simpsonville, was elected vice chair, and Cindy Sanders, a member of First Baptist Church, Barnwell, was elected secretary.
title: New SCBC Executive Board officers elected
